com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.subordinate

Class AbstractCondition

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.subordinate.AbstractCondition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Condition, Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractCompare, And, Not, Or

    public abstract class AbstractCondition
extends Object
implements Condition
    A "Condition" function that evaluate to either true or false.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Martin Shevchenko, Jonathan Austin
    See Also:
